00057 std::string sha1wrapper::hashIt(void)
00058 {
00059         hl_uint8 Message_Digest[20];
00060         sha1->SHA1Result(&context, Message_Digest);
00061 
00062         return convToString(Message_Digest);
00063 }
00064 
00073 std::string sha1wrapper::convToString(unsigned char *data)
00074 {
00075         std::ostringstream os;
00076         for(int i=0; i<20; ++i)
00077         {
00078                 /*
00079                  * set the width to 2
00080                  */
00081                 os.width(2);
00082 
00083                 /*
00084                  * fill with 0
00085                  */
00086                 os.fill('0');
00087 
00088                 /*
00089                  * conv to hex
00090                  */
00091                 os << std::hex << static_cast<unsigned int>(data[i]);
00092         }
00093 
00094         /*
00095          * return as std::string
00096          */
00097         return os.str();
00098 }
00099 
00107 void sha1wrapper::updateContext(unsigned char *data, unsigned int len)
00108 {
00109         sha1->SHA1Input(&context, data, len);
00110 }
00111 
00116 void sha1wrapper::resetContext(void)
00117 {
00118         sha1->SHA1Reset(&context);
00119 }
00120 
00121 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00122 //public memberfunctions
00123 
00127 sha1wrapper::sha1wrapper()
00128 {
00129         this->sha1 = new SHA1();
00130 }
00131 
00135 sha1wrapper::~sha1wrapper()
00136 {
00137         delete this->sha1;
00138 }
